title: Hardwell On Air Yearmix 2013
description: WOW! I'm nominated for 3 MTV EMA Awards (Best Dutch Act, Best World Stage Performance & Best Electronic Act)! Cast your vote now - http://djhardwell.com/vote Subscribe my channel now! → http://bit.ly/HardwellTube Join me on Facebook → http://bit.ly/HardwellFB Deorro & J-Trick - Rambo (Hardwell Edit) [Revealed Recordings] iTunes http://bit.ly/1or0wQ2 Subscribe the Hardwell On Air Podcast: http://bitly.com/HardwellOnAirPodcast Here it is Hardwell Yearmix 2013 featuring the biggest tracks of 2013! Thanks everyone for the support this year and let's make 2014 even bigger! Tracklist: 001 - Hardwell & Dyro feat. Bright Lights - Never Say Goodbye 002 - Deorro vs. Calvin Harris & Example - We'll Be Coming Yee (Hardwell MashUp) 003 - Baauer - Harlem Shake (Dave Silcox Remix) 004 - Mark Knight & Funkagenda - Man With The Red Face (Hardwell Remix) 005 - Hard Rock Sofa vs. Bruno Mars - Rasputin vs. Locked Out Of Heaven (Hardwell MashUp) 006 - Fatboy Slim & Riva Starr feat. Beardyman - Eat Sleep Rave Repeat (Calvin Harris Mix) 007 - Alesso vs. OneRepublic vs. Blasterjaxx & Hardwell - Lose Myself vs. Fifteen (Hardwell MashUp) 008 - Hardwell feat. Matthew Koma - Dare You (Extended Mix) 009 - Hardwell & Showtek vs. Lana Del Rey & Cedric Gervais - Summertime Sadness (Hardwell's TomorrowWorld Edit) 010 - Dimitri Vegas, MOGUAI & Like Mike vs. Afrojack & Steve Aoki - Mammoth vs. Beef (Hardwell MashUp) 011 - Hardwell vs. Krewella - Live For The Spaceman (Hardwell MashUp) 012 - Thomas Newson vs. Bobby Rock vs. Avicii vs. Nicky Romero - Pallaroid vs. Asire vs. I Could Be The One (Hardwell MashUp) 013 - Hardwell feat. Amba Shepherd - Apollo (Hardwell Concert Edit) 014 - TwoLoud vs. JoeySuki & Kill The Buzz - Big Bang vs. Life Is Calling (Hardwell MashUp) 015 - W&W & Ummet Ozcan vs. Empire Of The Sun vs. Daft Punk - The Code vs. Alive vs. Harder Better Faster (Hardwell Mashup) 016 - Alesso feat. Matthew Koma vs. Showtek & Justin Prime vs. Martin Garrix vs. Knife Party - Years vs. Cannonball vs. Animals vs. LRAD (Hardwell MashUp) 017 - Dimitri Vegas, Like Mike feat. Wolfpack vs. Hardwell & MAKJ - Ocarina Countdown (Hardwell MashUp) 018 - Hardwell & W&W - Jumper 019 - Krewella & Hardwell vs. W&W - Alive vs. Thunder (Hardwell MashUp) 020 - Alvaro & Mercer feat. Lil Jon vs. Dyro - Welcome To The Jungle vs. Leprechauns & Unicorns (Hardwell MashUp) 021 - DVBBS & Borgeous - Tsunami Hardwell On Air Yearmix 2013 For more info check: http://www.djhardwell.com http://www.twitter.com/hardwell http://www.facebook.com/djhardwell Subscribe the Hardwell On Air Podcast: http://bitly.com/HardwellOnAirPodcast
